text: robert
when rachel first told me she didn't
want to work for me
we fought all night and then she told me
she was going to work for you
and that changed everything a brilliant
black woman
mentor for my baby girl someone who
could teach her what the world does to
people like us
had to get down in the mud and still
manage to keep
her dignity and look at what you taught
her instead
is that what you came here to tell me i
came here to tell you to fire rachel
because she won't quit and when they
come at him to turn on you
i don't want her within a thousand miles
of this place
i'm sorry robert i can't do that
and you know why
i do
because it makes him look guilty
but he already is when they ask me to
help to get him to turn on you i'm going
to recommend that he does
do what you need to do and i'll do what
i need to do to save my firm
it doesn't matter what you do your firm
is gonna crumble all around you
is that a threat i don't ever threaten
you i don't have to lift a finger
because people are gonna come at you
from places you didn't even know existed
and i'm going to enjoy every second of
it
[Music]
you
